channel.title: Running my server with a client?
channel.description: Okay so I have spent about a month making and perfecting a 06 server. I want to realse it to fix bugs etc. But one problem, I'm a noob. Do I need to download a Client to run everything in my hybridscape folder in moparscape?

item.title: Running my server with a client?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

What have you been using to work on it the past month, like you’ve said?

Read full topic
